Title: Kagaku Bouken-tai Tansar 5
Description: ['In 1999, a special mystery/paranormal investigative unit consisting of five youths is formed. The series uses a mix of real tokusatsu footage (vehicle scenes) and animation (character drama).']
Related: ['Other: Kiki to Lala no Aoi Tori']
Voices: ['Komiyama, Kiyoshi', 'Mitsuya, Yuuji', 'Mizushima, Yuu', 'Yokozawa, Keiko', 'Nojima, Akio', 'Kobayashi, Kiyoshi', 'Hirose, Masashi']
